short_summary: Supply and delivery of tactical video display units.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply and delivery of three (3) Tactical Video Display Units to display command and control information in deployed tactical operation centres to support decision making and enable force protection. All the deliverables must be received on or before 31 March 2023.
full_summary:
# Announce: W6448-23C009 Tactical Video Display Units. 

### Solicitation 

*   Solicitation Number: WS3593599378
*   Solicitation Title: Tactical Video Display Units
*   Publication Date: August 23, 2022
*   Closing Date: September 13, 2022 at 2:00 PM EDT

### Contract Details

*   Contract Period: October 14, 2022 to March 31, 2025
*   Delivered Goods or Services: Supply and delivery of 3 Tactical Video Display Units
*   Delivery Location: Ontario (except the National Capital Region)

### End-User Entity

*   End User: Department of National Defence
*   Address:  101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Language of Purchase

*   English and French

### Contract Notice URL

*   http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13909457?extsite=MTM5MDk0NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Bidding Information

*   Bidding method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Decision Criteria: Lowest price
*   Documents required: All required supporting documentation
*   Submission deadline: September 13, 2022, 2 PM EDT

### Amendments

*   Amendment number: 1
*   Amendment date: 6 September 2022
*   Revised closing date: September 13, 2022 at 2:00 PM EDT

**Contact Information**  
*   Name: Kathleen Nimuan
*   Email: kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
*   Contact Information Note: Available in the [contract notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13909457?extsite=MTM5MDk0NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 


**Trade Agreements**

*   Refer to the contract notice for details on trade agreements and relevant provisions.

**Classification Code**

*   UNSPSC 46171612 - Video monitors
